1.0.0.name: wordpress/daily-horoscope-widget
1.0.0.description:
This widget allows users to pick from 12 signs to see a daily horoscope inside widget spaces.

  • Updated every day.
  • Keeps users coming back to your site.
  • Simple, clean, responsive and configurable design.
  • Works equally well on desktop or mobile.

Daily Horoscope Widget can either be used to bring in an iframe of today's horoscope, or as a list of 12 links to DianaGarland.com. The widget renders html anchors to horoscope pages on DianaGarland.com for users with NoScript, but requires you to enable this feature.
